Banner.Description: Hello my name is Mohamad Hamsho
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a Software Engineer with a passion for purposeful projects, I thrive on creating impactful solutions that align with my values. My focus is on developing innovative technologies that not only solve problems but also contribute to the greater good. I am committed to building apps and systems that make a difference, with a particular interest in projects that blend technology with meaningful, real-world applications.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Hiring technical talent for the company
Team leader of the technology department
Creation and maintenance of an internal process management platform for course sales
Programming custom functions and plugins for customizing a WordPress platform
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Creation and maintenance of a monitoring platform with charts in WordPress.
Functional programming in templates and plugins to add necessary monitoring features.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Creation and maintenance of a second Monitoring Platform made with Angular, Angular Material, Laravel, MySQL, RxJS, Sass with configurable charts, alarm systems, and user management and general configuration settings.

FeatureProjects.Title: Highlighted Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Projects

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Headstarter AI
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed and deployed 6 AI-driven applications in 6 weeks using React JS, Next.js, and Firebase. Integrated AI APIs to create innovative, intelligent solutions. Collaborated with engineers from Google, Y Combinator, and Stanford, leveraging their expertise to refine the projects. Applied agile methodologies and CI/CD practices for efficient, iterative deployment.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Quran Quest
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: As the Founder of Baraqah Bros, I created a mobile app company dedicated to gamifying education for Muslims, making learning engaging and accessible through innovative digital experiences.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: UMMA APP
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: At UMMA APP LLC, I work as a Software Engineer, where I design and develop innovative mobile solutions tailored to the needs of the Muslim community, focusing on creating seamless and impactful user experiences.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform for water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
